name: Super Squareface
description:
Super Squareface is a platformer made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare.

Controls are WASD and space for jump! Simple!

Ludum Dare page

v2 was updated AFTER the deadline so if your'e a purist feel free to play and judge v1.

v2 fixes a bug where people were getting stuck in walls when jumping. I added a zero friction physics material to the colliders, not a big deal, took about 5 minutes but makes quite a difference so I'd love it if you could play and judge that version instead.
